title.rendered: CELEBRATING A NEW DECADE IN 2020 STYLE!

content.rendered:
HAPPY 2020 FROM DIONNE AND THE D’LASHES TEAM!

Let’s bring in the new decade in 2020 Style! With positive energy, rediscovered passions, and a fresh new outlook. I always love the beginning of a new year. The possibilities are endless and it feels like just the right time to make new goals and reset after the chaos of the holidays. 

At the start of every new year, I like to sit down to focus on being present. I love to light a yummy candle, play some soothing music, and consider the things that I would like to receive from the next 365 days. Today, that looked like considering how to start off a new decade the right way – in 2020 Style. 

Dresses, earrings, and the Gucci bag are from FWRD.COM. Check them out for all your fashion-forward style needs. 

2020 Style Predictions

Starting off the 2020 style trends, we have bold looks like statement shoulders and lots of beautifully layered lace. We’ll be seeing a lot of strappy heels, neutral colors, and bags with eye-catching features. Sleek, slicked-back hair will allow striking earrings to shine center-stage and dewy, fresh skin will be complemented by natural, strong brows and gorgeous, full lashes.

What do you think about these 2020 Style predictions? What looks are you most excited to wear to ring in the new year? Let me know in the comments below or send me a DM on Instagram! 

As always, I hope that your holiday is happy and safe and that you get to spend it in a way that is refreshing to you. Sending you so much love in 2020!

HAPPY NEW YEAR 2020!

XO XO, Dionne Phillips

P.S. Have you booked your lash extensions appointment yet? For appointments – click here. Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here.
